[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content”][vc_column][vc_tta_tour active_section=”1″ css=”.vc_custom_1603364318480{background-color: rgba(244,244,244,0.45) !important;*background-color: rgb(244,244,244) !important;}”][vc_tta_section title=”Overview” tab_id=”1603363827492-bac1c334-5b98″][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_column_text]Enjoy real space and freedom at Express Park View II[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]These sophisticated apartments are built with the highest specification and each possesses its own unique character that emanates harmony, peaceful living and privacy. Featuring quality fittings and fixtures, these are luxurious yet affordable homes for the residents.

Open-plan living areas that culminate in balconies ensure natural light reaches deep into the apartments, and full-height glass doors provide a direct connection between the indoor and outdoor spaces.

Ideally located (Plot GH-03, CHI-V, Expressway, Greater Noida), amongst the major landmarks of Greater Noida, you are always at the centre of both business and leisure.

Real estate can be an excellent investment. If you want to diversify your holdings beyond stocks and bonds, this property is an excellent buy. Close proximity to world-class education centres like Amity University offer a perfect opportunity for students to come and study from nearby towns. You can easily make it a rental property and make your investment pay off.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][g5plus_heading title=”Quick Facts” css=”.vc_custom_1618236623932{margin-top: 25px !important;margin-bottom: 25px !important;}”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1618236585732{margin-bottom: 50px !important;}”][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][g5plus_icon_box icon_font=”fas fa-home” title=”Project Name: Express Park View II” description=”Status: Residential – Possession Started”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][g5plus_icon_box icon_font=”fas fa-book” title=”RERA Registration Numbers” description=”Towers – L, L1, M,

CCTV at suitable places with camera in all lifts.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Site / Floor Plans” tab_id=”1603364543516-f8a4fc3f-37a8″][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][g5plus_gallery images=”6550,6551,6552,6553″ columns=”4″ image_size=”gallery-size-md” items_md=”-1″ items_sm=”-1″ items_xs=”-1″ items_mb=”-1″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Location & Map” tab_id=”1603364541411-f35eaf90-f96c”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_column_text]Express Park View II is located at Plot GH-03, CHI-V, Expressway, Greater Noida. The lease hold area allotted to the project is around 52493.16 Sq.m. The project is in close proximity to finest malls, hospitals, golf course and institutes.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_column_text]
